H0.text: Who succeeded Alf Ramsey as England (caretaker) football manager in 1974. Don Revie

H1.text: Who succeeded Alf Ramsey as England (caretaker) football manager in 1974. Ron Greenwood

H2.text: Who succeeded Alf Ramsey as England (caretaker) football manager in 1974. Bobby Robson

H3.text: Who succeeded Alf Ramsey as England (caretaker) football manager in 1974. Joe Mercer

A4.text: Joe Mercer took control of the team on a caretaker basis for seven matches

A5.text: The FA appointed Don Revie on a five-year contract
